item.title: I Have An Admittedly Ridiculous Idea To Save ‘Destiny 2’
item.description: Destiny 2 has many problems currently, but the main one is what content players can play during its "dead time." Here's a goofy idea.

item.title: Rare Earth Stocks Surge On JPMorgan’s $1.5 Trillion U.S. Investment Pledge
